entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
May 17, 09:58 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 17, 09:22 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts Codespaces customers in Europe West geographic area and are working on mitigation. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

May 17, 08:15 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Codespaces in the Europe West geographic area. Some users may not be able to connect to their Codespaces at this time. We will update you on mitigation progress.

May 17, 07:36 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, API Requests, Codespaces, Git Operations, Issues, Pages, Pull Requests and Webhooks
entry.content:
May 11, 19:00 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 11, 18:54 UTC
Update - Reindexing is complete, and the /pulls and /search pages are up to date.

May 11, 18:19 UTC
Update - We’ve reindexed a little over half of the pull requests missing from the /pulls and /search pages.

May 11, 17:53 UTC
Update - We have reindexed about 20% of the pull requests missing from the /pulls and /search pages.

May 11, 17:21 UTC
Update - We’ve identified the full set of impacted pull requests not showing up on the /pulls and /search pages. We’ve kicked off a job to reindex them.

May 11, 16:55 UTC
Update - We’ve completed re-running the push jobs. We continue to investigate some pull requests not appearing in the /pulls and /search pages.

May 11, 16:23 UTC
Update - We’re continuing to investigate some pull requests not appearing in the /pulls and /search pages. Also, we continue to re-run the missed push jobs and webhooks.

May 11, 15:55 UTC
Update - We’re continuing to investigate some pull requests not appearing in the /pushes and /search pages. Also, we continue to re-run the missed webhooks.

May 11, 15:20 UTC
Update - We’re continuing to investigate a small number of pull requests not appearing on the /pulls and /search pages.

May 11, 14:46 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

May 11, 14:40 UTC
Update - Actions, API Requests, Codespaces, Git Operations, Issues and Webhooks are operating normally.

May 11, 14:38 UTC
Update - Git operations are restored and operating normally. We are working on backfilling delayed pull request push updates from 13:30 to 13:55 UTC. Some webhooks sent during that window were not delivered.

May 11, 14:19 UTC
Update - We see recovery across most services and requests. We continue to recover from backlogs and are observing for additional impact. We’ll post another update within 30 minutes.

May 11, 14:02 UTC
Update - We have restored git operations and are seeing error rates return to normal. We are continuing to monitor for impact.

May 11, 13:46 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with git operations leading to degraded experiences for many services. We will post an update within 30 minutes.

May 11, 13:41 UTC
Update - API Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 11, 13:40 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

May 11, 13:35 UTC
Update - Actions, Git Operations, Pages and Webhooks are experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

May 11, 13:33 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Issues and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, API Requests, Codespaces, Git Operations, Pages and Pull Requests
entry.content:
May 11, 00:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 11, 00:34 UTC
Update - API Requests is operating normally.

May 11, 00:06 UTC
Update - GitHub App token creation and write load has recovered. Actions, Codespaces, and Pull Requests are within SLOs again. Suspended Apps are being re-enabled while we monitor the recovery.

May 10, 23:27 UTC
Update - Token creation for GitHub Apps is failing in 11% of requests due to high write load, impacting core GitHub.com operations. High-traffic Apps are being temporarily disabled to aid system recovery.

May 10, 23:09 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate ongoing issues with delayed Actions runs, Codespace connections, and PR creation. We are performing a series of steps to mitigate the impact.

May 10, 21:12 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate ongoing issues with delayed Actions runs, Codespace connections, and PR creation. We are working on mitigating the impact on the core components of our platform.

May 10, 19:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate ongoing issues with delayed Actions runs, Codespace connections, and PR creation. We will provide a more detailed status update within an hour.

May 10, 17:38 UTC
Update - Git Operations is operating normally.

May 10, 17:16 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate issues with Actions queue delays, PR write times, and Codespaces start/resume. GitHub Enterprise Importer customers will also see a delay in migration starts.

May 10, 16:17 UTC
Update - Actions customers may see an increase in delayed runs, and some customers may see issues creating PRs and starting or resuming Codespaces. We continue to investigate and drive towards a mitigation.

May 10, 14:48 UTC
Update - Actions customers will see an increase in delays when queueing runs as we continue to mitigate the ongoing issue.

May 10, 14:42 UTC
Update - Pull Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

May 10, 14:37 UTC
Update - Git Operations is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

May 10, 14:05 UTC
Update - For Actions we are seeing issues for a subset of customers triggering workflow runs and scheduled runs. Workflows using the GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable are also encountering issues.

May 10, 14:03 UTC
Update - A subset of Codespaces customers are seeing failures when creating or starting Codespaces.

May 10, 14:01 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate the underlying issue which is causing impact.

May 10, 13:28 UTC
Update - API Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 10, 13:23 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues which are impacting Codespaces, Actions and GitHub Apps which use server-to-server tokens. We are working towards mitigation and will update as we know more.

May 10, 13:10 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

May 10, 13:00 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 10, 13:00 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Git Operations
entry.content:
May 10, 00:06 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 9, 23:31 UTC
Update - We are seeing slower than usual times to run git clone over HTTPS. SSH is not impacted. We continue to investigate.

May 9, 22:52 UTC
Update - We are seeing slower than usual times to run git clone over HTTPS. SSH is not impacted. We continue to investigate.

May 9, 22:39 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.content:

Update - Git Operations is operating normally.

Update - All services continue to operate normally and we are continuing work on restoring delayed pull request updates for some impacted customers. We will go back to green once that work has completed.

Update - API Requests is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Update - Pull Requests is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 12:17 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

May 9, 12:09 UTC
Update - We are investigating an issue that is impacting many of our services. We are working to mitigate this and will provide updates as available.

May 9, 12:05 UTC
Update - Git Operations is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

May 9, 12:04 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 12:03 UTC
Update - Issues is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 11:59 UTC
Update - Pull Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 11:55 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 11:45 UTC
Update - API Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 11:41 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

May 9, 11:36 UTC
Update - Issues is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

May 9, 11:32 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, API Requests, Copilot and Git Operations
entry.content:
Apr 25, 03:18 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 25, 03:08 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work towards mitigating the connection resets and connection timeouts that some clients located in West US are experiencing.

Apr 25, 01:31 UTC
Update - Starting at 20:30 UTC, a small % of clients in West US are seeing connection resets or connection timeouts, leading to failed action downloads. We are continuing to work to identify a mitigation.

Apr 25, 00:13 UTC
Update - Copilot is operating normally.

Apr 24, 23:14 UTC
Update - We continue to investigate an issue causing fewer than 1% of workflow runs on GitHub-hosted runners to fail.

Apr 24, 22:33 UTC
Update - API Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Apr 24, 22:29 UTC
Update - Git Operations is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Apr 24, 22:17 UTC
Update - We are actively investigating an issue causing fewer than 1% of workflow runs on GitHub-hosted runners to fail.

Apr 24, 22:03 UTC
Update - We are actively investigating an issue causing fewer than 1% of Copilot code suggestions to time out.

Apr 24, 21:29 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Apr 24, 21:14 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Apr 19, 19:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 19, 19:27 UTC
Update - We've applied a mitigation and workflows targeting hosted Linux/Windows Larger Runners are running again. There may be some continued delays as queues are processed.

Apr 19, 18:33 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted Linux/Windows Larger Runners, leading to high wait times. Other hosted labels and self-hosted runners are not impacted.

Apr 19, 18:28 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, Codespaces and Pages
entry.content:
Mar 29, 19:03 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 29, 18:18 UTC
Update - Codespaces is operating normally.

Mar 29, 18:13 UTC
Update - We are still working towards full recovery. Actions jobs still experience delays when being queued.

Mar 29, 18:10 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Mar 29, 17:41 UTC
Update - We are still working towards full recovery. Actions jobs still experience delays when being queued.

Mar 29, 17:29 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 29, 16:56 UTC
Update - Actions workflows have started running again. We're continuing to work towards full recovery.

Mar 29, 16:47 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Mar 29, 16:22 UTC
Update - We are seeing signs of recovery for Actions and continue to monitor closely. We will continue to post updates about progress as soon as we have them.

Mar 29, 15:42 UTC
Update - We continue to work on mitigating the problems with Actions and Pages with high urgency. We will continue to post updates about our progress.

Mar 29, 15:29 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Mar 29, 14:56 UTC
Update - We are still investigating the cause of Actions degradation, we will provide an update when we have one.

Mar 29, 14:43 UTC
Update - Actions is now experiencing degraded availability. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Mar 29, 14:21 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Mar 28, 17:07 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 28, 16:59 UTC
Update - We've applied a mitigation to fix the issues with queuing and running Actions jobs. We are seeing improvements in telemetry and are monitoring for full recovery.

Mar 28, 16:28 UTC
Update - The team continues to investigate issues with some Actions jobs being queued for a long time and a percentage of jobs failing. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Mar 28, 15:45 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.
